title: Moving my NA account to KR?
body: I'm living in korea and I have an NA account. I moved to korea about 2 years ago, and now i'm getting back into LoL. I have an NA account with a lot of stuff and I was wondering if there is ANY way to move it over?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately it is not possible to initiate transfers between NA and KR due to region restrictions (the cinderella law mainly). Your best bet if you have a KSSN would be to make a new korean account or continue to play on NA from Korea by downloading the NA game client.
